channel.title: Comments on: Trent asks, “How do I wipe my smartphone?”
channel.description: Tech news worth talking about and tech help worth listening to

item.title: By: Tips for Protecting Your New Device, and What to Do With Your Old One - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.dc:creator: Tips for Protecting Your New Device, and What to Do With Your Old One - Deemable Tech | Deemable Tech
item.description: […] No matter what you decide to do with your old device, you need to make sure you wipe its memory and reset it to factory device if possible. The last thing you want is for your personal information to fall into the wrong hands. Your device should have come with instructions on how to reset it. We’ve got full details on how to do it for iPhones, iPads and Android phones in this article. […]
item.content:encoded: […] No matter what you decide to do with your old device, you need to make sure you wipe its memory and reset it to factory device if possible. The last thing you want is for your personal information to fall into the wrong hands. Your device should have come with instructions on how to reset it. We’ve got full details on how to do it for iPhones, iPads and Android phones in this article. […]
